analyze module¶

analyze.main_method(mod_path)[source]¶

Calls the R script performing statistical analysis.

Creates a python function from the R system command using rpy2 then sources the R script stats.R and passes the path to the data/ldmks/ directory containing the csv files with the landamark coordinates.

Parameters:mod_path (string) – Path to the pfla module
Returns:
Return type:None
